resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Software Development Engineer II
work.description: Demonstrated a proven ability to lead and mentor team members in the development of mission-critical design systems. Through collaborative efforts, We successfully delivered high-quality solutions that met and exceeded client expectations. My hands-on experience in web and application development has equipped me with a deep understanding of industry best practices and emerging technologies. Provide technical leadership and guidance to the development team in adopting best practices and coding standards, Mentor junior team members conduct code reviews and assist in their professional growth. Lead the development of mission-critical design systems to ensure consistency and efficiency in the user interface across different components and projects.

work.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
work.description: Design and develop high-quality scalable and maintainable front-end code for web. Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies and evaluate their applicability to the existing tech stack. Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including product managers & designers & back-end engineers to deliver end-to-end solutions.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Design and develop high-quality scalable and maintainable front-end code for web. Communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders providing updates on progress/challenges and proposed solutions. Contribute to project planning and estimation providing technical input on timelines and resource requirements.

testimonials.text: Passionate Software Developer having #yearOfExp# years of experience in Web development & good hands on JavaScript. Always got work on Front end side (React, React Native & Angular) but at my own I always explore new things & do work on nodeJS, mongoDB & Firebase. So that I can be a full stack (MEAN/MERN) developer
